title: Guide to Selling on Amazon FBA
headline: Learn in this free online course how to establish and expand your eCommerce business using Amazon FBA.
description: Amazon's marketplace is one of the world's largest retail platforms and the frontrunner in eCommerce. It's also the perfect place to begin your successful online business. If you would like to start selling or sell more on Amazon but need some guidance, this course is for you. You will discover accurate and helpful insights on the complete Amazon selling process and learn how to grow your business using several effective pieces of software.

courseDescription:
Selling stuff on the internet is an excellent method to launch a business and earn income. This course reveals the best Amazon selling strategies for selling more, easier and faster. It begins with the fundamentals of selling on Amazon and includes a presentation of a range of tools and Chrome Addons used to make starting your company simple and easy. Then you'll learn how to get your products ready for ‘Fulfillment by Amazon’ (FBA) shipment. After that, you'll learn why you should automate your Amazon price management and how to do it with the premier repricing tools like RepriceIt and Bqool.

The course then describes the best tactics to increase your Amazon sales, including how to avoid losing money on faulty items by reading a Keepa chart and optimising your inventory. You will discover how to remove negative feedback and prevent intellectual property (IP) claims using free Google Chrome plugins. Creating a free shipping template for Amazon ‘Fulfilled by Merchant’ (FBM) selling is also explained. The following tips will teach you about the reselling process. You will learn about managing return requests and cancelled orders and practising online arbitrage from outside the USA.

Next, the course discusses the most typical issues encountered by Amazon sellers and describes their remedies. You will find out what the term ‘Inventory Performance Index’ implies and the advantages and disadvantages of wholesale and online arbitrage, two top reselling business models. After that, you will discover how to ship multiple stock keeping units (SKUs) into FBA and whether you need shipment insurance. Finally, you will learn how to get past bogus IP claims and how to get ‘ungated’ on Amazon so that you may climb up the ranks of Amazon.

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this certificate course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this certificate course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison certificate is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital certificate: a downloadable certificate in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked certificate, posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security marked certificate in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.
Start Course Now

All certificate are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison certificate, please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison certificate, you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. For more details on our certificate pricing, please visit our Pricing Page

modules.name: Module
modules.details: The Basics of Selling on Amazon
modules.description: This module will walk you through many tactics for selling on Amazon FBA that are both simple and successful. You'll discover how to use helpful Chrome Extensions and cashback sites and how to pack and ship Amazon purchases. You'll learn about the finest repricing software for Amazon pricing automation.
topics: The Basics of Selling on Amazon - Learning Outcomes
How to Sell on Amazon FBA
The Basics of Selling on Amazon - Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
modules.description: This module discusses the best strategies for selling more on Amazon and scaling your reselling business. You'll discover how to manage Amazon Returns and Canceled Orders and use a Prep Center. You will also learn about Amazon Seller queries and answers.
topics: The Best 5 Amazon Selling Tips - Learning Outcomes
How to Boost Your Amazon Sales
Dealing with Common Amazon Selling Problems
The Best 5 Amazon Selling Tips - Lesson Summary
